author: @newstrack_eng
title: How Excessive Consumption of Tea and Coffee Can Be Harmful | NewsTrack English 1
text: Tea and coffee are cherished beverages for many, providing a comforting ritual and a boost of energy. However, excessive consumption of these caffeinated drinks can have several negative effects on your health. Understanding these potential risks and learning how to manage your intake can lead to a healthier lifestyle. The Impact of Excessive Caffeine Caffeine, the primary stimulant in tea and coffee, can have various impacts on your body when consumed in excess. Here are some of the common issues associated with high caffeine intake: Headaches and Migraines: Excessive caffeine can lead to headaches or migraines. Caffeine withdrawal can also trigger headaches in regular consumers who suddenly cut back or stop drinking it. Reduced Concentration and Mental Fog: While caffeine can initially improve alertness and concentration, overconsumption can lead to mental fatigue and reduced cognitive function. This paradoxical effect may make it harder to focus and think clearly. Increased Fatigue: Overreliance on caffeine for energy can backfire. As the stimulant wears off, you might experience increased fatigue and the need for even more caffeine to counteract it. Irritability and Anxiety: High doses of caffeine can increase irritability and anxiety levels. Caffeine stimulates the central nervous system, which can heighten stress and lead to nervousness or mood swings. Depression and Mood Disorders: Chronic excessive caffeine consumption may contribute to mood disorders, including feelings of depression and persistent low mood. Sleep Disturbances: Consuming caffeine, especially in the late afternoon or evening, can interfere with your ability to fall asleep and reduce sleep quality, leading to insomnia and disrupted sleep patterns. Tips for Managing and Reducing Caffeine Intake If you recognize these symptoms and wish to cut down on your tea and coffee consumption, consider the following strategies: Gradual Reduction: Instead of quitting caffeine abruptly, gradually decrease your intake. If youâ€™re used to drinking 7-8 cups a day, try reducing by one cup per day. This gradual approach helps minimize withdrawal symptoms and makes the process more manageable. Prioritize Sleep: To combat the fatigue associated with reducing caffeine, focus on improving your sleep quality. Aim for 7-9 hours of restful sleep each night and establish a consistent sleep schedule. Reduce Tea Leaves and Coffee Grounds: Lower the amount of tea leaves or coffee grounds used in your beverages. This reduction decreases the caffeine content per serving, helping you cut down on overall consumption. Incorporate Detox Drinks: Replace some of your caffeinated drinks with detox drinks like herbal teas, lemon water, or cucumber water. These options keep you hydrated and may help reduce cravings for caffeine. Consult a Healthcare Professional: If you struggle to manage your caffeine intake on your own, seek advice from a healthcare provider. They can offer personalized strategies for reducing caffeine consumption and improving your overall health. The Benefits of Cutting Back on Caffeine Reducing your caffeine intake can lead to several health benefits, including: Improved Sleep Quality: With lower caffeine levels, you may find it easier to fall asleep and enjoy more restful nights. Enhanced Mood Stability: Less caffeine can lead to reduced irritability and anxiety, contributing to a more stable mood. Increased Energy Levels: Without the ups and downs of caffeine stimulation, you might experience more consistent energy levels throughout the day. Better Cognitive Function: Lower caffeine intake can reduce mental fog and improve overall concentration and cognitive performance. By understanding the potential harm of excessive tea and coffee consumption and following these practical tips, you can manage your intake effectively and enjoy a healthier lifestyle. [Ayush Minister Prataprao Jadhav Opens Delhi Health Expo, Announces National Screening Program](https://english.newstracklive.com/news/ayush-minister-prataprao-jadhav-opens-delhi-health-expo-announces-national-screening-program-sc1-nu318-ta318-1326050-1.html) [How the Risk of Food Poisoning Increases During the Rainy Season: Know the Symptoms](https://english.newstracklive.com/news/the-risk-of-food-poisoning-increases-during-the-rainy-season-know-its-symptoms-sc96-nu915-ta915-ta372-1325945-1.html)

author: Arundhati Ail
title: A growing community of mushroom-spotters is spotlighting fascinating fungi in India
text: During the lockdowns in Delhi in 2020, when most public places were shut, the only outdoor spaces that remained accessible were the capitalâ€™s pockets of green. In parks like Sunder Nursery, Lodhi Gardens and Sanjay Van, residents found pockets of peace amidst nature. It was then that Malavika Bhatia, a 30-year-old local, began spotting fascinating mushrooms in Delhiâ€™s parksâ€”sprouting from decades-old tree trunks, clustered in a muddy corner and hiding expertly under plants and leaves. â€œThey were really curious little ecosystems in their own right,â€ they say. Monsoon is when these ecosystems thrive, appearing in the unlikeliest places across lush forests as well as busy cities like Bengaluru, Delhi, Mumbai and more. We walk by these stunning mushroomsâ€”which show up in a variety of shapes, colours and striking patternsâ€”everyday, but only a trained eye can really spot them. Bhatia is part of a small but growing community of mushroom spotters and enthusiasts in India, who lead trails across different parts of the country, introducing curious folks to these fascinating ecosystems hidden in plain sight. Last year, they also organised the first edition of Shroom Sabha, a four-day festival in Kerala that featured foraging and exploration trails, and workshops of mushroom cultivation, pairings and more. The festival saw over 100 attendees and will be back for a second edition in October this year. Meet the mushroom spotters Bhatia is a Psychology graduate who was always interested in nature. A wild food foraging course before the pandemic got her thinking about wild mushrooms found in the country. Bhatia began leading mushroom-spotting walks in the capital in 2021. â€œWe tend to think of cities as concrete jungles where nothing really grows. Mushrooms really disrupt that idea,â€ they say. â€œThese opportunistic organisms grow anywhere and everywhere to consume food and nutrients. You can find them on the sidewalk, on tree barks, in flower pots. If you leave a chair out in your backyard for a few months, there will be mushrooms growing on it in no time. They exist all around us, and once you learn to see them, you really canâ€™t stop noticing them.â€ Bhatia met Bengaluru-based Vhyom Bhatt on a mushroom enthusiasts whatsapp group with over 200 members. It was 2021 and Bhatt had just spent several months in Himachal Pradesh, where he had discovered mushrooms like gucchi (morel mushrooms), chicken of the woods and chanterelle. â€œLocal communities in Himachal have so much knowledge about these mushroom varieties that most of us wouldnâ€™t even know about. Thatâ€™s when I really got into mushroom identification and foraging. I discovered about 30-35 mushroom species that were completely new to me,â€ he says. He started growing mushrooms at home, and soon joined Nuvedo, a Bengaluru-based start-up that creates mushroom-based products, including DIY mushroom growing kits. To educate consumers, he began conducting mushroom spotting walks in Bengaluru, and hasnâ€™t stopped since. Much like Bhatia, Goa resident and naturalist Omkar Dharwadkar always felt an affinity for nature and the outdoors. When he was in college studying computer engineering, he would spend weekends in the wilderness of Goa with a small group of friends and volunteer at nature camps for kids so he could meet wildlife experts. He joined a resort as a naturalist soon after he graduated college, and went on to found Mrugaya Xpeditions, a tour company that offers nature trails in Goa. Fungi and mushrooms especially intrigued him. â€œThey are present in every habitat in the world, from the hottest to the coldest places on earth,â€ he says. â€œWhatâ€™s interesting is that they adapt to their surroundings in such unique ways, with different shapes, colours, odours and even bioluminescence,â€ he says. Where to go mushroom spotting in India â€œOne thing to remember is that every place in the world will have mushrooms, and you can spot them if youâ€™re visiting in the right season,â€ Bhatt says. Monsoon is the reproductive period for fungi and the best time to spot some seriously fascinating mushrooms in India. â€œIf you go into a forest and see a lot of mushrooms, itâ€™s a great sign that the forest floor is fertile and in prime condition,â€ he says. A forest's mycelial network is often likened to the human nervous system. Mushrooms help decompose dead matter, improve nutrient intake of plants and make forests and soil more resilient. And it helps that they are incredibly cool to look at; if, of course, you learn to really look. Here are Bhatia, Bhatt and Dharwadkarâ€™s recommendations for the best places to go mushroom spotting in Delhi, Bengaluru, Goa and Kerala, and what to spot while youâ€™re there: Delhi In Delhi, Bhatia recommends heading to Sunder Nursery and Lodhi Gardens during the monsoon to spot unusual mushrooms. One of her favourite mushrooms to spot is the birdâ€™s nest mushroom, which mimics a tiny birdâ€™s nest, eggs and all. â€œThere are these mushrooms called Earth stars that are found in the Central Ridge Reserve Forest. They almost look like constellations on the forest floor,â€ they say. Follow Malavika on Kerala Visit Wayanad in Kerala towards the end of the monsoon season in September. â€œOne of the most beautiful mushrooms to spot in Wayanad, on the outskirts of Periyar National Park, are bridal veil stinkhorns, named so because of the white, veil-like lacy structure around its stalkâ€ Bhatia says. â€œThey are gorgeous and theyâ€™re also edible. You can also find giant oyster mushrooms here that are 2-3 times the size of a human head and are also edible.â€ Bengaluru Bhatt recommends heading to Cubbon Park in the monsoon to spot mushrooms. â€œI spotted bridal veil mushrooms there, but instead of a white veil, they had bright orange veils which were so striking. You can spot termitomyces, which grow on termite mounds. These are edible and are used in many households as a meat replacement during Shravan. Itâ€™s a very heavily harvested mushroom but finding it in a public park is very cool. I have also spotted wild oyster mushrooms and beautiful orange gymnopilus at the park.â€ Follow Vhyom on Goa In the forested parts of Goa, away from its sandy beaches and popular tourist spots, several mushroom species grow in abundance. When the rains turn the forests of Mollem, Netravali and Mhadei lush green, mushrooms in various shapes, sizes and colours, and fascinating features like bioluminescence, make a brief but stunning appearance. â€œThe glowing mushrooms in Goa are by far the most fascinating mushrooms I have ever seen,â€ says Dharwadkar. â€œI have mostly spotted them in the forested areas in Goa, where they appear during monsoon. Thereâ€™s no way to tell exactly when and where they will appear and their lifespan is just about 2-3 days. I also love spotting glowing fungus, which appears on dead plant matter and sometimes even on live trees. The fruiting body is never visible but only the mycelium glows in the dark. I have also spotted birdâ€™s nest mushrooms in Mollem National Park and Netravali Wildlife Sanctuary. Bracket fungus typically show up across Goa in different shapes and sizes, but the fascinating part about them is the release of the spores. These are actually billions of spores being dispersed by the wind and sometimes at certain angles of light, the spores scatter light into its visible spectrumâ€”it almost appears like smoke being released from the fungus. Lastly, zombie fungus, which is an insect-pathogenic fungus, attaches itself to insects and alters their behavioural patterns. It essentially makes the insect behave in a way thatâ€™s beneficial to the fungus. I have seen them across Goa, in various habitats, and it really is like an otherworldly experience. Check out [Mrugaya Xpeditions](https://www.instagram.com/mrugayaxpeditions/) for bioluminescent fungi tours

author: Eduardo A. Encina
title: Lightning defenseman J.J. Moser out another 8 to 10 weeks
text:
TAMPA â€” The Lightning are expected to be without defenseman J.J. Moser for another eight to 10 weeks as he recovers from a lower-body injury sustained Dec. 12 at Calgary.
When the Lightning first placed Moser on injured reserve, coach Jon Cooper said he considered him week to week. The new timetable projects Moser to return after the 4 Nations Faceoff break in late February.
Moser has been a major addition to the Lightning blue line after being acquired over the summer in the trade that sent defenseman Mikhail Sergachev to Utah and also netted 20-year-old forward Conor Geekie.
Moser, 24, has contributed to better defensive play and is averaging 19:54 of ice time playing mostly in a top-pairing role on his off side on the right alongside star Victor Hedman. Moser also has played a role on the Lightningâ€™s penalty kill and their second power-play unit.
Moserâ€™s plus-13 ranks second among Lightning defensemen, trailing only Ryan McDonaghâ€™s plus-17. He has two goals, including one shorthanded, and eight assists.
Moser left the Calgary game late in the second period after falling to the ice while chasing a loose puck along with Flames forward Nazem Kadri into the defensive end. The injury did not require surgery.
In Moserâ€™s absence, right-shot defenseman Darren Raddysh has moved next to Hedman, a spot he played frequently last season. Raddysh entered Thursday with two assists in his last three games with a plus-5 since his playing time spiked.
The Lightning called up Steven Santini from AHL Syracuse to give them an extra right-side defenseman while out in Western Canada last week when Erik Cernak was out. Crunch right-shot defenseman Max Crozier also would have been on the short list of potential call-ups had he not been injured, but he is expected to return at the end of next week.
The Lightning have existing cap space, about $1.6 million according to PuckPedia, so in order to use the space that Moserâ€™s injury could create (he carries a $3.375 million cap hit) by going on long-term injured reserve, theyâ€™d have to add contract from the minors to surpass the cap threshold before they can use LTIR.
But for now, it appears likely the Lightning will stick with their existing defensemen options, carrying six defensemen and 21 active players, and keeping the cap space for potential future use.
â€¢ â€¢ â€¢

Never miss out on the latest with your favorite Tampa Bay sports teams. Follow our coverage on Instagram , X and Facebook .

author: Romane Tardy
title: Si vous avez l'une de ces 5 attitudes, vous devez avoir du mal Ã  vous faire de vrais amis
text:
> VIDEO
Si vous avez l'une de ces 5 attitudes, vous devez avoir du mal Ã  vous faire de vrais amis Romane Tardy , Mis Ã  jour le 30 AoÃ»t 2024 06:54 Certains comportements inconscients peuvent faire de vous une personne dont il est difficile de se rapprocher ou avec laquelle devenir ami. Voici comment les identifier.
Etre sympathique et sociable ne suffit pas toujours pour crÃ©er des liens ou se faire des amis. Avec certaines personnes, la communication est parfois difficile, dÃ©sagrÃ©able, voire carrÃ©ment agaÃ§ante, sans quelles ne s'en rendent compte ou qu'on sache vraiment pourquoi. Au point qu'on n'a pas vraiment envie de s'en rapprocher, mÃªme si elles sont polies et avenantes de prime abord. Vous pouvez d'ailleurs en faire partie. Ceci Ã©tant, certains signes peuvent vous Ã©clairer. Les repÃ©rer est la premiÃ¨re Ã©tape vers un changement. Voici 5 attitudes qui font de vous quelqu'un de difficile Ã  vivre.
1. Si vous Ãªtes souvent au centre des histoires ou des dÃ©saccords, posez-vous des questions, comme le met en avant l'expert en psychologie et en relation humaine, Lachlan Brown, pour Global English Editing . Se trouver frÃ©quemment au cÅ“ur des conflits n'est pas un hasard : vous pouvez en Ãªtre le dÃ©nominateur commun. Cela ne fait pas de vous une mauvaise personne, mais implique plutÃ´t que votre approche des interactions sociales n'est pas la bonne. Si vous n'assumez pas votre part de responsabilitÃ© dans le conflit, vous enfoncez encore plus la situation. Il faut savoir se remettre en question.
2. Etre trop dur avec les autres peut aussi vous porter prÃ©judice. Ne pas faire preuve d'empathie va vous empÃªcher de partager avec ceux qui vous entourent. Ils vont avoir l'impression d'Ãªtre incompris ou que vous leur accordez peu d'importance. Se montrer Ã  l'Ã©coute est une vÃ©ritable qualitÃ©, surtout avec une Ã©coute active, qui est un Ã©lÃ©ment clÃ© de la communication.
3. De mÃªme, Ãªtre trop critique ne va pas vous aider Ã  nouer des relations. Etre honnÃªte est certes bÃ©nÃ©fique mais lorsqu'il ne s'agit que de nÃ©gativitÃ©, cela va finir par poser problÃ¨me. Cette nÃ©gativitÃ© se double parfois d'une tendance Ã  la victimisation, qui n'est pas non plus favorable.
4. Autre aspect qui rend dÃ©sagrÃ©able : la rancune. Si vous faites partie de ces personnes qui ne parviennent pas Ã  pardonner, il peut Ãªtre difficile de s'entendre avec vous. L'erreur est humaine et ne jamais rien laisser passer viendra perturber vos relations alors que pardonner est un signe de comprÃ©hension. S'il ne faut pas rester coincÃ© dans le passÃ©, il est aussi primordial de savoir sortir de ses habitudes.
Mieux vaut Ã©viter de boire l'eau du robinet de cette piÃ¨ce, il y a un risque mÃ©connu pour la santÃ©
Plus de 100 nouveaux pesticides autorisÃ©s en France, la liste des produits concernÃ©s est longue 5. Etre trop conservateur et rÃ©tif au changement est une tare. Les personnes avec lesquelles il est difficile de crÃ©er du lien sont souvent rÃ©ticentes au changement et prÃ©fÃ¨rent leur zone de confort. Il est pourtant nÃ©cessaire de savoir s'adapter pour entretenir des relations saines.
Cependant, tous ces comportements ne sont pas forcÃ©ment conscients. Vous n'avez alors pas une bonne conscience de vous-mÃªme et donc des consÃ©quences de vos actes et cela empÃªche de nouveau de se rapprocher de vous. C'est un cercle vicieux dont il faut sortir avant tout en restant authentique mais tout en reconnaissant vos forces et vos faiblesses.

author: world today news
title: Man Discovers Daily Butter and Cheese Binge Isn't a Healthy Choice
text:
The Extreme Carnivore Diet: A Florida Manâ€™s journey from Weight Loss to Cholesterol Lesions
Eating Florida man took his dietary habits to an extreme that left doctors stunned. According to a report published in carnivore diet heâ€Œ discovered online, consuming 6 to 9 pounds of cheeseâ¤ adn sticks of butterâ¢ daily.
The â£manâ€™s routine included mixing these high-fat â€‹ingredients into his â€œdaily hamburgers,â€â£ a practice that initially seemedâ¢ to yield positive results. As reported by cholesterol -hands-while-carnivore-diet-jamaâ€ target=â€ blankâ€ rel=â€noopenerâ€>Fox 10 â¢Phoenix, he experienced weight loss, improved mentalâ¢ clarity, and increased energy. Though, monthsâ€‹ intoâ€‹ this extreme regimen,â£ he noticed something alarming: strange yellow lesions on his hands and â€Œother parts of his body.
Doctors diagnosed the condition asâ£ xanthelasma, a buildup of cholesterol deposits that the body cannot â€Œprocess. These lesions, described asâ€Œ â€œglobs of pure, unleaded cholesterol,â€ were a direct result of his excessive intake ofâ€‹ saturated fats .
The case highlights the potential â€dangers of extreme dietary practices, notably those thatâ€ eliminate entire food groups.While the â€carnivore diet â€‹has gained popularity for its purportedâ€Œ benefits, â€this incident serves as a stark reminder of the risks associated wiht unbalanced nutrition.

author: Escrito por: AmÃ©rica LÃ³pez
title: Zapotlanejo, Jalisco: Solicitan declaratoria de emergencia tras desbordamiento de presa La Tecata
text:
DespuÃ©s de las fuertes lluvias que ocasionaron el desbordamiento de la presa La Tecata , las autoridades de Zapotlanejo, Jalisco, piden una declaratoria de emergencia , pues hay mÃ¡s de 150 casas afectadas , ademÃ¡s de cientos de damnificados.
â€œEl llamado al ingreso del Fondo de Desastres Naturales que es el Foden ese es el primer paso y a partir de aquÃ­ vamos a ver hasta dÃ³nde viene el apoyo por parte del estadoâ€, dijo el alcalde de dicho municipio, GonzÃ¡lo Ãlvarez BarragÃ¡nÃlvarez BarragÃ¡n.
TambiÃ©n seÃ±alÃ³ que hay mÃ¡s de 150 casas afectadas a consecuencia de las lluvias de la madrugada del miÃ©rcoles; sin embargo, dejÃ³ en claro que no se ha contabilizado a cuÃ¡nto asciende el monto econÃ³mico de los daÃ±os materiales.
En respuesta inmediata al desbordamiento de la presa cercana a la colonia Bellavista, derivado de las intensas lluvias de esta madrugada en Zapotlanejo, mÃ¡s de 150 servidores pÃºblicos, de los tres niveles de Gobierno, se encuentran desplegados en la zona atendiendo la emergencia.â€¦ pic.twitter.com/clh1ejP35D
â€” Enrique Alfaro (@EnriqueAlfaroR) August 15, 2024 â€œEn cantidad econÃ³mica no sabemos todavÃ­a, se estÃ¡n haciendo los dictÃ¡menes para poder saber a cuÃ¡nto ascienden los daÃ±os. La verdad es que cambia mucho de una zona a otra, una casa tiene un valor y otra otro, ahorita es difÃ­cil cuantificarloâ€.
En total hay 159 viviendas afectadas, 10 de estas con daÃ±os estructurales y al menos 2 inhabitables, ademÃ¡s 16 negocios, 2 gasolineras. Las principales colonias afectadas son: Mezquitera, San MartÃ­n, Las Tres Flores, Bellavista, La Cruz, Loma Dorada y Zona Centro.
ðŸ”´ #IMPORTANTE | EmisiÃ³n Declaratoria de Emergencia en Zapotlanejo: 159 viviendas (10 con daÃ±os estructurales, 2 inhabitables ) 16 negocios, 2 gasolineras. Colonias afectadas; Mezquitera, San MartÃ­n, Las Tres Flores, Bellavista, La Cruz, Loma Dorada y Zona Centro. pic.twitter.com/pmmPyNl4zv
â€” Tv Azteca Jalisco (@TVAztecaJalisco) August 15, 2024 Habitantes se solidarizaron con los afectados y comenzaron a ofrecerles ropa, comida y zapatos para las personas damnificadas.
Cabe destacar que una vez realizada la declaratoria de emergencia para el municipio de Zapotlanejo, el apoyo, a travÃ©s del Foden, podrÃ¡ ser expedido en un plazo de 15 a 22 dÃ­as.
Joven muere tras desbordamiento de presa en Zapotlanejo, Jalisco Desde las primeras horas del pasado miÃ©rcoles, el alcalde de Zapotlanejo dio a conocer la lamentable noticia de la muerte de un joven de apenas 21 aÃ±os, quien fue encontrado sin vida en el patio de la casa de uno de sus familiares tras ser arrastrado por la corriente.
Por su parte, el gobernador de Jalisco, Enrique Alfaro, mencionÃ³ que 40 personas fueron evacuadas preventivamente y se encuentran en un refugio temporal, ademÃ¡s de que las labores de saneamiento del municipio siguen.

author: @AlessiaRabbai
title: Madonna di Trevignano, una testimone: "Gisella faceva esorcismi e diceva di lottare con Satana"
text: Madonna di Trevignano, una testimone: â€œGisella faceva esorcismi e diceva di lottare con Satanaâ€ Fantomatiche guarigioni ed esorcismi sono argomenti di cui le testate giornalistiche e i programmi televisivi hanno parlato molto in concomitanza della [strage che ha scosso Altavilla Milicia](https://www.fanpage.it/attualita/che-cose-un-esorcismo-e-perche-se-ne-parla-per-la-strage-di-altavilla-milicia/), fatti che perÃ² non hanno nulla a che vedere con la fede. Ad improvvisarli sarebbe stata anche Maria Giuseppa Scarpulla, a detta di alcuni ex seguaci che hanno raccontato le loro esperienze con la veggente, che dice di vedere la Madonna a Trevignano Romano. A parlarne la trasmissione Mediaset Mattino Cinque condotta da Federica Panicucci con un servizio del giornalista Paolo Capresi. "Gisella raccontava spesso di praticare esorcismi su persone indemoniate o che lei riteneva tali â€“ a parlare Ã¨ una testimone che vuole restare anonima â€“ Mi ricordo piÃ¹ di una volta e in piÃ¹ di un'occasione anche fuori Trevignano che spesso la veggente faceva dei gruppi di preghiera ad esempio a Rimini o in altri posti, dove raccontava spesso di persone indemoniate e che lei si trovava sempre a "lottare con il diavolo". Raccontava di liberare queste persone, ma soprattutto di lottare con Satana". Per la Chiesa cattolica gli esorcismi possono essere praticati solo da sacerdoti scelti e incaricati dal vescovo, come quello della diocesi di Civitacastellana all'interno della quale ricade Trevignano Romano e [che Fanpage.it ha intervistato](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/lesorcista-spiega-come-la-dioscesi-di-civita-castellana-indaga-sul-caso-di-trevignano-e-non-solo/). "Gisella ha chiesto di interrompere cure mediche" La testimone segreta intervistata da Mattino Cinque spiega: "Alla presenza di alcuni sacerdoti Gisella imponeva le mani sopra la testa delle persone e iniziava a pregare. Se durante quel rituale la persona che stava esorcizzando non sveniva era come se non avesse funzionato. Inoltre â€“ continua â€“ dopo la messa â€“ in una chiesa non specificata ndr â€“ in sacrestia Gisella impartiva la benedizione alle persone". La testimone con cui parla il giornalista Mediaset spiega che Ã¨ successo anche che venisse chiesto di interrompere cure mediche: "Durante il periodo del Covid per esempio io ho sentito piÃ¹ di una volta dire se non dimettete subito il vostro caro, che magari era ricoverato in un reparto Covid morirÃ , se riuscite a farlo dimettere vivrÃ ". Fanpage.it raccomanda al lettore di rivolgersi sempre ai medici e seguire le cure. "Tutto falso, Ã¨ autosuggestione" Anche Luigi Avella, l'ex fedele di Gisella che ha donato volontariamente 123mila euro all'associazione Madonna di Trevignano Ets che aveva sentito parlare dei riti che faceva Scarpulla un giorno incuriosito le ha chiesto di partecipare: "Gisella mi ha imposto le mani, io per farla contenta sono caduto sul divano, ma stavo recitando, non Ã¨ successo nulla. Il marito di Gisella che era caduto dopo di me si Ã¨ messo a ridere. Il problema Ã¨ che molte persone ci credono a queste cose, molte plagiate si autosuggestionano, fate attenzione". [ ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/madonna-di-trevignano-in-un-messaggio-della-veggente-gisella-gesu-fa-politica/) [ Carlo denuncia: "Mia sorella fedele di Gisella, non riesco piÃ¹ a vederla" ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/madonna-di-trevignano-carlo-denuncia-mia-sorella-fedele-di-gisella-non-riesco-piu-a-vederla/) [ L'ex portavoce di Gisella: "Il marito Gianni Cardia mi ha minacciata" ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/madonna-di-trevignano-lex-portavoce-di-gisella-il-marito-gianni-cardia-mi-ha-minacciata/) [ I nuovi messaggi di Gisella per spaventare i seguaci: "Fate scorte di cibo" ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/madonna-di-trevignano-i-nuovi-messaggi-di-gisella-per-spaventare-i-seguaci-fate-scorte-di-cibo/) [ L'esorcista spiega come la Chiesa indaga sul caso di Trevignano e non solo ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/lesorcista-spiega-come-la-dioscesi-di-civita-castellana-indaga-sul-caso-di-trevignano-e-non-solo/) [ La Scienza spiega perchÃ© le statuette "lacrimano" e "sudano" da millenni ](https://www.fanpage.it/roma/la-scienziata-del-cicap-spiega-perche-le-statuette-lacrimano-e-sudano-da-millenni/)

author: Renfield_s
title: #37 Rabino sionista expone la mentalidad supremacista sionista autoproclamÃ¡ndose como los "elegidos de dios" y admitiendo sentirse superior a los no-judios
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#3](c3#c-3) y estÃ¡ escrito, en su libro mÃ¡gico, que todos los no judÃ­os existen para servir a los judÃ­os.
Su libro mÃ¡gico es el bueno, los demÃ¡s libros mÃ¡gicos no.
[#19](c19#c-19) En realidad sÃ­, pero no te alarmes, no hay construcciÃ³n de la identidad etnica de un grupo (y mÃ¡s si se trata de uno generalmente minoritario y perseguido)n sin su dosis de etnocentrismo.
En el caso de los creyentes en yahvÃ© el resto de la humanidad es referida como â€œgoyimâ€, o â€œgentilesâ€ y no tiene connotaciones especialmente positivas.
[#3](c3#c-3) TÃ­pico de fanatismos y sectas cuando se hace una barrera entre los que estÃ¡n dentro y los que estÃ¡n fuera. Cuando la religiÃ³n no respeta otras formas de ver el mundo es cuando empiezan los fanatismos y las hostias. Si no se acepta la diversidad de credos, apaga y vÃ¡monos porque lo que viene luego no es agradable para nadie.
Luego empezarÃ¡n con sus Frentes Populares de Judea y acabarÃ¡n a hostia limpia entre ellos, porque alguien que necesita y busca enemigos para elevar su moral y sus creencias son un saco de hostias en potencia. Alguien que piense asÃ­, tiene todas las papeletas para recibir hostias a cascoporro y es lo que van buscando. Quien anda con fuego acaba quemÃ¡ndose.
[#5](c5#c-5) En realidad este discurso en concreto se parece mÃ¡s al del ISIS que al de Hitler.
Aunque el resultado de ambos sea el mismo.
[#9](c9#c-9) Creo que el problema es que eso lo dice la religiÃ³n de los judÃ­os, que son descendientes de no sÃ© quÃ© tribu elegida por un dios.
Y habrÃ¡ judÃ­os que se tomen el judaismo como pertenencia a un grupo y lo reinterpretan y lo ponen al servicio de su vida (igual que hay cristianos que no apedrean a su hija si se casa sin el permiso de su padre). Pero el judaismo tiene una base de supremacismo muy mala de esquivar.
[#2](c2#c-2) Un mes.. da un mes, al resto del planeta - sin eeuu... iban a ver los "elegidos" que opinan de aquello del "pueblo elegido"...
Pues para ser el pueblo elegido:
- menuda mierda territorio les ha dado, a mÃ­ que me den algo que no sea un puto desierto: Francia, El norte de EspaÃ±a, Italia, las Seychelles, las mismas orillas del Nilo, Mesopotamia. Zonas fÃ©rtiles.
- Salvo los Ãºltimos 70 aÃ±os les han dado mÃ¡s que a una estera.
AsÃ­ que menudo dios cutre.
[#11](c11#c-11) Eso es: si su dios los hubiera elegido y les tuviera cariÃ±o bien pudo haberles dao cuerpo de senegalÃ©s...
[#11](c11#c-11) Un amigo ingeniero agrÃ³nomo me contÃ³ que aquella zona en tiempos bÃ­blicos fue un vergel, pero empezaron a regar los cultivos con agua de mar y se lo cargaron. No son muy listos los â€œelegidosâ€.
Si Dios existiera harÃ­a un fisting con su culo y les enviarÃ­a al puto infierno por toda la eternidad.
[#23](c23#c-23) No sÃ© salvaron los que no quisieron realizar la AliÃ¡ (que empezÃ³ en 1840 https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ali%C3%A1 ) y a esos que no se salvaron los llamaron los sacrificados o holocausto https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holocausto_(sacrificio)
Es supremacista (pueblo elegido, el resto estÃ¡ para servir) y elitista (no buscan crear nuevos adeptos como en el cristianismo o islamismo o naces judÃ­o o no eres judÃ­o)
Esto lo dicen los lideres religiosos judios y la mayoria de ellos lo aceptan como algo natural y te lo repiten con otras palabras menos extremas pero que vienen a ser lo mismo
Pues al final hablando asÃ­ hasta hacen buenos a los nazis, igual estaban engaÃ±ados con esta gente...
